body:
Hey guys, I recently entered a Razer Contest and I wanted to notify you guys so you have a slim chance of winning some of the prizes. Ten grand prize winners will receive a Razer Reversible Hoodie, a brand new NVIDIA GTX 760 Video Card, and a pair of the new Kraken Pro Neon headset. Also, three runner-ups will receive a Razer Tremor T-shirt, and a pair of the new Kraken Pro Neon headset.

Razer Giveaway Contest: http://splur.gy/r/VHb0C/r/2MvXqhx0YjZ
It's not a scam, I did it from the Razer website.
 
I would not give people links to that of a scamming website. I am victim to one of them and I do not want to put people through the pain of getting rid of a virus, etc. You can quote me on this if you get a virus or any other harmful things from this website.

Please reply to this post if you used the link. I do not want it to die.
